Title: Generating Content for the Metaverse with Stefano Corazza
Description:
In this exciting episode of Building the Open Metaverse, Marc & Patrick talk to Stefano Corazza, Head of Roblox Studio and discuss the fascinating realms of 3D technology, the metaverse, machine learning, and the creative power of Roblox Studio. Discover the potential of these technologies and gain exclusive insights into the future of virtual experiences.
